instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 video artifacts when presure on ogic board
threads.message:
Came in for repair, it gives the bloks like in the picture when you hold/press the bottem plate.
sometimes it also boots very slow

pictures are like hold(blocks) let go no blocks

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 video artifacts when presure on ogic board
threads.message:
oke this is i think the issue but stil wants some thougts about it


if i tap C160Z the machine gives the artifacts random shut down, or no boot. even 3 beeps like ram issue............

i am gone replace it now and see how it goes....


btw replacing with tweezers and no hot air, dont want to disdurp the issue if it is not this....

[B]no tobad not the issue[/B]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 video artifacts when presure on ogic board
[SOLVED]820-3115 video artifacts when presure on ogic board
threads.message: Bad RAM slot. MAX out the top slot as it is usually the one closest to the keyboard that dies.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 video artifacts when presure on ogic board
threads.message:
RAM SLOT REMOVED AND I CAN PUSH AL I WANT NOTHING HAPPENS

SOLVED
Thank you Duke
